document.bingtitle: Star Wars fans can try black-bunned Darth Vader burger at French ...
document.webtitle: Star Wars fans can try black-bunned Darth Vader burger at French fast-food restaurant | Hot Topics - seattlepi.com
document.description: Star Wars fans can try black-bunned Darth Vader burger at French fast-food restaurant ... for man who stole from police 4/19/12; What’s that hanging from window? A car ...
document.body:

Shopping Real Estate
Index
Hot Topics Trending news, culture and entertainment for the Seattle area. « Kardashians to get the Barbie doll treatment | Main | Tourist survives after bungee cord snaps » Star Wars fans can try black-bunned Darth Vader burger at French fast-food restaurant Tweet Share Quick special-edition Star Wars burgers
French burger chain Quick is inviting diners to “choose their side of the force,” offering dark burgers and jedi burgers to correspond with characters in the series, which is being re-released in 3D.
Those who side with Darth Vader end up with a double-decker cheeseburger on a jet-black bun. Yoda’s version appears to have some sort of cheese curd on it. ( Or are they marshmallows? )
The Quick Star Wars burgers will be served between January 31 and March 1, at locations in France and Belgium.
Burger King, McDonald’s, Whataburger: Take note. Tweet Share Posted by kate.shellnutt@chron.com (Kate Shellnutt) on January 6, 2012 at 11:43 am | Permalink | Categories: Darth Vader , Food , France , Movies , Star Wars , burger kate.shellnutt@chron.com (Kate Shellnutt) More Follow: Search for: Posts | Comments Log in Latest Posts
